system.description:
A measure of abilities in advanced physical feats, including climbing,
swimming, sprinting and sports in general. Because its uses tend to be
rather broad, this is a skill that many times do not get a penalty to roll
for simple tasks unskilled (see p. 14).
At the Referee’s discretion, you may add the Athletics skill to
appropriate physical characteristic rolls (for dangerous jumps or
dodges, for example).
• Climb a high tree quickly: roll Athletics (DEX or STR) 6+. If the tree has low
branches to get an initial boost, don’t apply a penalty if the character doesn’t
have a level in Athletics.
• Climb a steep cliff: roll Athletics (DEX or STR) 8+, or 6+ with basic climbing
equipment.
• Swim in a stormy ocean: roll Athletics (STR) 8+. Failure might mean the
character starts sinking, specially if they’re trying to bring along substantial
gear on their back.
system.name: Skill Name
